#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n;
	cin>>n;
	for(int t=0;t<=n;t++)
	{
		char c[100];
		gets(c);
	int count,j,z=0;
	char e[100];
		for(int i=0;c[i]!='\0';i++)
		   {
			
				if(c[i]=='0')
				{
					e[z]=char(32);
					z++;
				}
				else if(c[i]=='2')
				{
			     	count=0;
					j=0;
					while(c[i+j]=='2'&&j<3)
					{
						if(c[i+j]=='#')
						break;
						if(c[i+j]=='2')
						count++;
						j++;
					}
					if(count==1)
					{e[z]='A'; z++;}
					else if(count==2)
					{e[z]='B'; z++;i=i+1;continue;}
					else if(count==3)
					{e[z]='C'; z++;i=i+2;continue;}
					
			    }
				else if(c[i]=='3')
					{
					count=0;
					j=0;
					while(c[i+j]=='3'&&j<3)
					{
						if(c[i+j]=='#')
						break;
						if(c[i+j]=='3')
						count++;
						j++;
					} 
					if(count==1)
					{e[z]='D'; z++;}
					else if(count==2)
					{e[z]='E'; z++;i=i+1;continue;}
					else if(count==3)
					{e[z]='F'; z++;i=i+2;continue;}
				    }
				else if(c[i]=='4')
				{
					count=0;
					j=0;
					while(c[i+j]=='4'&&j<3)
					{
						if(c[i+j]=='#')
						break;
						if(c[i+j]=='4')
						count++;
						j++;
					}
					if(count==1)
					{e[z]='G'; z++;}
					else if(count==2)
					{e[z]='H'; z++;i=i+1;continue;}
					else if(count==3)
					{e[z]='I'; z++;i=i+2;continue;}
			    }
				else if(c[i]=='5')
				{
					count=0;
					j=0;
					while(c[i+j]=='5'&&j<3)
					{
						if(c[i+j]=='#')
						break;
						if(c[i+j]=='5')
						count++;
						j++;
					}
					if(count==1)
					{e[z]='J'; z++;}
					else if(count==2)
					{e[z]='K'; z++;i=i+1;continue;}
					else if(count==3)
					{e[z]='L'; z++;i=i+2;continue;}
			    }
				else if(c[i]=='6')
				{
					count=0;
					j=0;
					while(c[i+j]=='6'&&j<3)
					{
						if(c[i+j]=='#')
						break;
						if(c[i+j]=='6')
						count++;
						j++;
					}
					if(count==1)
					{e[z]='M'; z++;}
					else if(count==2)
					{e[z]='N'; z++;i=i+1;continue;}
					else if(count==3)
					{e[z]='O'; z++;i=i+2;continue;}
			    }
				else if(c[i]=='7')
				{
					count=0;
					j=0;
					while(c[i+j]=='7'&&j<4)
					{
						if(c[i+j]=='#')
						break;
						if(c[i+j]=='7')
						count++;
						j++;
					}
					if(count==1)
					{e[z]='P'; z++;}
					else if(count==2)
					{e[z]='Q'; z++;i=i+1;continue;}
					else if(count==3)
					{e[z]='R'; z++;i=i+2;continue;}
					else
					{e[z]='S'; z++;i=i+3;continue;}
				}
				else if(c[i]=='8')
				{
					count=0;
					j=0;
					while(c[i+j]=='8'&&j<3)
					{
					if(c[i+j]=='#')
						break;
						if(c[i+j]=='8')
						count++;
						j++;
					}
					if(count==1)
					{e[z]='T'; z++;}
					else if(count==2)
					{e[z]='U'; z++;i=i+1;continue;}
					else if(count==3)
					{e[z]='V'; z++;i=i+2;continue;}
				}
				else if(c[i]=='9')
				{
					count=0;
					j=0;
					while(c[i+j]=='9'&&j<4)
					{
						if(c[i+j]=='#')
						break;
						if(c[i+j]=='9')
						count++;
						j++;
					}
					if(count==1)
					{e[z]='W'; z++;}
					else if(count==2)
					{e[z]='X'; z++;i=i+1;continue;}
					else if(count==3)
					{e[z]='Y'; z++;i=i+2;continue;}
					else
					{e[z]='Z'; z++;i=i+3;continue;}
				}
				else 
				e[z]==char(32);
			}
		for(int k=0;k<z;k++)
		cout<<e[k];
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
